name: Fireshock
description:
DISCLAIMER:

This project is a W.I.P and is planned to be a puzzle platformer game where 2 siblings escape an abandoned factory. Most of the spritework came from the spritepacks credited below.

Controls:

WASD for fire person.

Arrow keys for lightning person.

Credit:

Rohaid Bakheet: Level Design

Pika: Movement Scripts

Serp: Music

Kel: Animations and Spritework

Marcy: Feedback

Spritepacks used for Levels:
    - LavaCavesPackv1

    - Multi_Platformer_Tileset - Diego del Solar or "Shackhal"

    - platform_metroidvania asset pack v1.01

    - s4m_ur4i_huge-assetpack
